column2: Open your spell list to see available spells.
Close your spell list and access other decisions.
Cast the Dispel spell, cleansing yourself of all temporary magical effects, including beneficial ones.
The Banish spell allows you to attempt to remove an Outsider character from this plane of existence permantently.
Cast the Planar Binding spell, summoning an outsider to serve you. The type of outsider may vary based on your religion.
Cast the Animate Dead spell, summoning a force of undead troops.\n\nThere is also a settlement decisions version of this spell!
Cast the Animate Dead spell, summoning a force of undead troops. If cast on a province populated by the living, this will cause a negative reaction.

A mighty spell that shall breach the barrier between life and death, creating a servant with unwavering loyalty and power. Beware of tampering with forces sinister and foul, for they will take your life.
Use the Turn Undead spell, which lowers the combat abilities of an undead enemy leader and has a chance to wipe out undead troops.
[From.GetBestName] has cast the Turn Undead spell!
Must be Journeyman Cleric of higher.
Must be Expert Cleric of higher.
Must be Master Cleric of higher.
Must be Renowned Cleric of higher.
Perform the Lesser Restoration ritual to cure a disease from the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this ritual as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nPerform the Lesser Restoration ritual to cure a disease from the target character.
Perform the Greater Restoration ritual to cure all diseases from the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nPerform the Greater Restoration ritual to cure all diseases from the target character.
Perform the Mass Restoration ritual to cure a disease from the target province.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rsettlement decision§!\n\nPerform the Mass Restoration ritual to cure a disease from the target province.
Perform the Heal ritual to cure an injury on the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nPerform the Heal ritual to cure an injury on the target character.
Perform the Regeneration ritual to cure injuries and restore lost limbs or disfigurement on the target character.
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nPerform the Regeneration ritual to cure injuries and restore lost limbs or disfigurement on the target character.
Cast the Sune's Splendor spell to remove scarring on yourself.
Cast the Planar Ally spell, summoning an outsider to serve you. The type of outsider may vary based on your religion.
All injuries and maiming are healed.
